special_attacks: +1 on attack rolls against goblinoid and orc humanoids, rage (19 rounds/day), rage powers (guarded stance +2, knockback, strength surge +7)
other_gear: masterwork full plate, light hammer (2), masterwork adamantine greataxe, throwing axe (2), cloak of resistance +1, climber's kit, masterwork artisan's tools, 2 gp
feats: Armor Proficiency (heavy), Greater Sunder, Improved Sunder, Power Attack

sections.body:
During Combat The barbarian uses her guarded stance and alternates between dealing damage and sundering weapons.

Base Statistics When not raging, the barbarian's statistics are

AC 20, touch 11, flat-footed 19

hp 79

Fort +9

Will +5

Melee mwk adamantine greataxe +11/+6 (1d12+4/×3)

Ranged light hammer +8 (1d4+3) or throwing axe +8 (1d6+3)

Str 16

Con 16

CMB +10 (+14 sunder)

Skills Climb +8.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: A sundering axe whittles away at her enemies' abilities to attack and defend themselves.

defensive_abilities: defensive training (+4 dodge bonus to AC vs. giants), improved uncanny dodge, trap sense +2
name: Sundering Axe
skills: Acrobatics +5 (+1 when jumping), Climb +10, Craft (weapons) +10, Knowledge (dungeoneering) +5, Perception +12 (+14 to notice unusual stonework)
cmd: 21 (25 vs. bull rush or trip, 23 vs. sunder)
will: +7; +2 vs. poison, spells, and spell-like abilities
combat_gear: oil of magic weapon, potion of cure light wounds, potion of shield of faith, acid (3)
